knimeNode.name: GeniusPro Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads a list of GeniusPro result-files into Knime. Files are grouped according to their file names, which are suppossed to follow the pattern: "$Barcode$.xls".

fullDescription.intro: Reads a list of exported Envision result files into Knime.
fullDescription.option:
There are two modes of operation. Either you can choose a single directory in which the nodes will search for GeniusPro files. The search is applied not only to the direct directory contents but also to also its subfolders.
The second mode is to select a set of files (by keeping the apple/windows-key pressed while selecting files).
